name: Artivest Holdings
description: Developer of an online investment platform designed to offer an investment opportunity in private equity and hedge funds. The company's online investment platform employed advanced encryption technology to effectively provide bank-level security, enabling users to get an assurance of safe payments.
one_liner: Developer of an online investment platform designed to offer an investment opportunity in private equity and hedge funds. The company's online investment platform employed advanced encryption technology to effectively provide bank-level security, enabling users to get an assurance of safe payments.
